lead_paragraph: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard expects Manchester City and Liverpool to be the London side's main rivals in the Premier League title race after the top three sides all enjoyed victories on the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Hazard Expects Three-Way Battle for Premier League Title
headline.main: Hazard Expects Three-Way Battle for Premier League Title

snippet: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard expects Manchester City and Liverpool to be the London side's main rivals in the Premier League title race after the top three sides all enjoyed victories on the weekend....
